Mosaik’s Design-Build Services

Mosaik is your one-stop shop for any home remodeling project.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Saul-Zaik-Kitchen-1.jpg” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

This is design-build

Our design-build process eliminates the hassles, headaches, and disappointment of home-remodeling. From start to finish, we handle it all: design, build, project management, and everything in between.

Preparation – Our design and construction teams work closely together as one seamless unit, eliminating the confusion and problems associated with the old-school approach to home remodeling.

Communication – We talk to each other — and to you — throughout the process. Frequent check-ins and progress reports give you peace-of-mind and confidence in our work.

Execution – We get the job done quickly and efficiently, always delivering on our promises.

That’s design-build.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_image=”off” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”|10%||10%|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” min_height=”340px” min_height_tablet=”” min_height_phone=”” min_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”auto” height_phone=”auto” height_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”|auto||15%|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto||auto|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||auto|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Scott & Erin transformed our home and we absolutely love it. We highly recommend Mosaik!

– NANCY C.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|off” module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” height=”340px” height_tablet=”” height_phone=”” height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”|15%||auto|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”|auto|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Mosaik Design and Remodeling truly sets the high standard when it comes to home design and remodel. Their work is impeccable and their attention to detail is uncompromised. They managed our project as if it was in their own home and we could not be happier.

– KAREN D.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Davis-remodel-portfolio-11.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off”]

Our specialties

If you could change anything about your home, what would it be? That’s the question we’ll help you answer.

Whether it’s a full home remodel or seamless home addition, our design-build work is only exceeded by our commitment to service and your satisfaction. Our focus is on improving your home and how you live in it.

We specialize in transforming:

  • Kitchens
  • Additions
  • Bathrooms
  • Basements

In addition to design-build and remodeling services, we offer interior design services to enhance any of our home remodels or additions. We take the guesswork out of finding the perfect artwork, furniture, colors, and materials.

Landscaping

When remodeling your home’s interior, you may also be inspired to freshen up your yard, too. We apply our thoughtful and proven design-build process to create beautiful, creative, and eco-friendly landscapes, including:

  • Pavers
  • Flatwork
  • Stairs
  • Planter boxes
  • Landscape lighting
  • Irrigation
  • Selecting new plants
  • Relocating existing plants

Since the project will be led by the same design-build team who’s tackling your interior remodel, your new landscape will feel like a seamless addition to your home.

View Portfolios

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_portfolio posts_number=”2″ include_categories=”19,18″ show_categories=”off” show_pagination=”off” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ z_index_tablet=”500″ title_text_shadow_horizontal_length_tablet=”0px” title_text_shadow_vertical_length_tablet=”0px” title_text_shadow_blur_strength_tablet=”1px” caption_text_shadow_horizontal_length_tablet=”0px” caption_text_shadow_vertical_length_tablet=”0px” caption_text_shadow_blur_strength_tablet=”1px” pagination_text_shadow_horizontal_length_tablet=”0px” pagination_text_shadow_vertical_length_tablet=”0px” pagination_text_shadow_blur_strength_tablet=”1px” box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_horizontal_image_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_image_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_image_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_image_tablet=”0px” text_shadow_horizontal_length_tablet=”0px” text_shadow_vertical_length_tablet=”0px” text_shadow_blur_strength_tablet=”1px”][/et_pb_portfolio][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Services-Page-Bathroom-flipped.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”60px|30px|60px|30px|false|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”105px||105px|||”]

Expect more from Mosaik!

We go above and beyond what you’d expect from any other Portland home remodeler. We solve problems before they start, we never throw anyone under the bus, and we take full responsibility for every aspect of your remodeling project.

The buck stops with us.

We’re 100% dedicated to making sure you’re thrilled with both the results we deliver and the service we offer.

We really do make design-build remodeling fun!

excerpt.rendered: Mosaik’s Design-Build Services Mosaik is your one-stop shop for any home remodeling project.This is design-build Our design-build process eliminates the hassles, headaches, and disappointment of home-remodeling. From start to finish, we handle it all: design, build, project management, and everything in between. Preparation – Our design and construction teams work closely together as one seamless […]
